name: Absolute Control
description:
You, a measly slime, must stop the evil AI from going out of control! You have only 60 seconds to do so, and every action counts! Your goal is to hit a lever which will deactivate the evil AI once and for all! There are 5 scattered about, but you only need to hit one! Can you find out how to get to all of them?

This is my first GMTK jam submission, and I'm happy with how it turned out! Of course, I wish I could have added more polish, etc. but at my skill level, I'm quite proud of how it turned out.

Controls:

Press the up arrow key to jump! You can jump up to 7 times, and your jumps refresh when touching a solid object. 

Press the left and right arrow keys to move left and right.

Press the "R" key to restart!
